projects.title: Automated Vulnerability Scanner
highlights: Built web vulnerability scanner detecting XSS, SQLi, and CSRF across 15+ vectors
Automated crawling scanning 500+ URLs per session and found 35+ critical vulns
Multi-threaded scanning (10 concurrent requests) improved speed 3.5x
Custom payload generation engine with 200+ attack signatures and stealth mode

projects.title: Enterprise Phishing Awareness Simulation
highlights: Ran controlled phishing simulation on 150+ participants (23% click-through rate)
Designed 5 realistic scenarios and tracked 300+ interaction data points
Produced 20-page awareness report reducing susceptibility by 60% post-training
Built dashboard showing open rate, clicks, and credential submissions

projects.title: CTF Champion (College Competition)
highlights: Led 3-member team to 1st place against 15 teams
Solved 18/25 challenges scoring 3200 points in 24-hour contest
Exploited SQLi, XSS, privilege escalation, and reverse engineering tasks
